themes: need for proactive and inclusive policy-making
importance of transparency in funding decisions
community advisory panels for program development
building trust with the creative community
key_phrases: opportunity to become a national leader in equitable arts funding
take a more proactive and inclusive approach to policy-making
revisit its definitions of underrepresented groups to include women
conduct regular equity audits of its programs and grant outcomes
transparency around who receives funding, and how those decisions are made
create community advisory panels made up of diverse artists and cultural leaders
ensure ongoing relevance to those it aims to serve
barriers_identified: lack of transparency in funding decisions
potential lack of ongoing relevance to the community
solutions_proposed: revisit definitions of underrepresented groups to include women
create community advisory panels made up of diverse artists and cultural leaders
